name: Starting Village
description: A quaint little village where your adventure begins. Mostly peaceful.

name: Whispering Woods
description: A dense forest rumored to have ancient secrets. Watch out for rustling leaves!

name: Dragon's Peak
description: The highest mountain in the region, said to be the lair of a fearsome dragon.

name: Forgotten Ruins
description: Crumbling stones of a long-lost civilization. Might contain treasure or danger.
